snippet: The author of “The Marriage Plot” and “Middlesex” says the best marriage plot novel of all time is Henry James’s “Portrait of a Lady,” because it presents an “anti-marriage” plot.
abstract: By the Book interview with Jeffrey Eugenides, author of The Marriage Plot, who says the best marriage plot of all time is Portrait of a Lady by Henry James.
lead_paragraph: The author of “The Marriage Plot” and “Middlesex” says the best marriage plot novel of all time is Henry James’s “Portrait of a Lady,” because it presents an “anti-marriage” plot.
